txt.en: Wolves have long been a scourge of the peaceful people of the Shire. In hard winters, they may come down from the North to prey upon livestock and to threaten the hobbits themselves in vicious packs. More recently, it seems that greater numbers have moved south, and there are rumours that they are being driven this way by goblins or even more sinister forces.

You have slain a good many wolves, but they do not relent. Whatever it is that has driven them down from the wintry forests and hills of the North holds more fear for them than hobbit-clubs and arrows.\n\nSo be it. You will not be thwarted either.
